name: HARDY
description:
Have fun delivering packages to somebody with their finger on the self-destruct button. This is my very first game ever created. All of the art, sound, programming, and music were created for this game. Feel free to let me know what you think of the game. Furthermore, it was created for the GameDev.tv - Community Game Jam. Thanks

Controls:

Move - A + D

Jump - Space, W, Up Arrow

Boost - Shift

Drop Package - F

v. 1.01
